p: In 2017, the attack rate in our institution was 1% for our whole HIV-infected patients' cohort, and 3% among those patients MSM or bisexual. This is a higher number of cases and incidence than in the other French HIV cohorts from Paris and Lyon for which incidence was reported in 2017. Indeed, 4 and 16 acute HAV cases were reported in these centres, respectively [ 3, 4]. In addition, about half of the 20 patients HAV diagnosed in our centre were hospitalised, in gastroenterology or infectious disease units. This proportion is similar to the mean proportion observed in previous studies (51%), although it varied considerably, from 21% to 100%, according to the studies. In a previous study, Lee et al. described a prolonged duration of symptoms of hepatitis for HIV positive patients than for those HIV negative ones [ 5].
